Question
========

In a sample of 17 individuals, the Pearson product moment correlation coefficient was calculated between systolic and diastolic blood pressure, resulting in the value 0.845. When testing H~0~: ρ
= 0 (α = 0.05 two-sided), the critical area is equal to

Answerlist
----------

* < - 0.4555 ; 0.4555 >
* < - ∞ ; - 0.4555 ] ∪ [ 0.4555 ; + ∞ >
* < - ∞ ; - 0.4821 ] ∪ [ 0.4821 ; + ∞ >
* < - ∞ ; - 0.4853 ] ∪ [ 0.4853 ; + ∞ >

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* < - 0.4555 ; 0.4555 >: Incorrect
* < - ∞ ; - 0.4555 ] ∪ [ 0.4555 ; + ∞ >: Correct
* < - ∞ ; - 0.4821 ] ∪ [ 0.4821 ; + ∞ >: Incorrect
* < - ∞ ; - 0.4853 ] ∪ [ 0.4853 ; + ∞ >: Incorrect
